forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then thunderstorms and rain between 8pm and 11pm, then rain and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 60 overnight. South wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am. Partly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.date: 4/02/25- Closed due to a major ice storm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: The area surrounding Nub's Nob has experienced a massive ice storm that has left much destruction in its wake. Power has recently been restored to the lodge and our Crew is beginning the clean-up effort that includes thousands of down tree branches on our slopes and the road leading to Nub's Nob.  The lodge and locker room are open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM if you need to stop out to grab your skis. There is a small chance we could open on very limited terrain on Saturday and Sunday. We will make that decision tomorrow by noon. We hope to see you on the slopes real soon
